General.Name: Ce Link Ltd
General.Description: Anfu CE LINK Limited researches, designs, develops, manufactures, sells, and services electronic signal transmission adaptation products and other consumer electronics products. It offers electrical and electronic products, which include cables, signal adapters, converter, docking stations, chargers, power sockets and gaming power supplies, etc. The company also provides energy storage systems, such as smartbox, solar inverters, residential energy storage systems, battery systems, portable power stations, and battery expansion packs; smart home products, including video doorbells, cameras, robot vacuum and mop products, floor cleaners, Wifi power strip pads, and robots; hubs; power strips, surge protectors, and outlet wall plates; and PC power products. It supplies its products to the retail market and corporate customers in the form of ODM. The company's products are used in smart mobile communications, audio-visual equipment, PCs, smart wearable devices, and various electronic terminal products fields. In addition, it engages in import and export trade; processing and assembly of electronic products; equity investment; and provision of software and information technology services. Anfu CE LINK Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Ji'an, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Anfu County Industrial Park, Ji'An, China, 343200
